channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Look Good, Feel Good
channel.desc: Find the best in health and fitness products to give you a spring in your step and a healthier lifestyle. From top tips and great gadgets, we'll help you to revitalise your daily routine.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: EMU Footwear
channel.desc: Showcase of Australian born, based and owned brand EMU that has passionately produced the world's finest premium sheepskin and Merino wool products for over 20 years.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Ben de Lisi
channel.desc: Ben de Lisi is bringing his gorgeous fashion aesthetic to QVC UK. With a focus on beautiful fabrics and innovative design, Ben's distinctive look is the epitome of modern elegance.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Menopause Your Way
channel.desc: Menopause Your Way - Sexual Wellness Edit.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Beauty Tools & Accessories
channel.desc: The beauty tools you use are as important as your products, so enjoy professional-standard implements and accessories, from lash curlers to make-up bags and tweezers to brushes.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: New In
channel.desc: New In: Kelly Hoppen Home Design.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: SKINN Skincare
channel.desc: Everyone deserves access to skincare innovations, which is why the SKINN brand creates formulas with a scientific approach, to promote lifelong beauty and wellness.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: All About Accessories
channel.desc: Add a finishing flourish to your look with the help of our accessories edit. We'll be showcasing the latest arrivals from our top brands and getting top tips from our guests on how best to style them.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Kelly Hoppen Home Design
channel.desc: Kelly Hoppen is a renowned interior designer and now she's created a range just for QVC! It includes fine linens, cushions and accent pieces featuring her signature style.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Morning Show
channel.desc: Wake up to QVC! We've chosen products from across all our ranges to ensure there is something for everyone to enjoy. Tune in to see special guests too.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Monsoon
channel.desc: Elegant, bohemian-style fashion awaits in this show dedicated to the iconic brand Monsoon, who offer you a range of vibrant prints and flattering shapes to give you clothes you'll adore.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Elevate your Space
channel.desc: Elevate your Space with Kelly Hoppen.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Frank Usher
channel.desc: Discover elegant clothing and accessories from Frank Usher. Designed for the modern woman, these beautiful designs will add a touch of sparkle and glamour to your wardrobe with comfort in mind.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Best Deals in Home
channel.desc: Best Deals in Home.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Kipling on 4 Easy Pay
channel.desc: Discover your new favourite bag from Kipling and spread the cost in four interest-free instalments too! From clever cross-bodies to terrific totes, find your next bag on offer right here.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Luxury Jewellery
channel.desc: Indulge yourself in our collection of fine, exquisite jewellery. Each piece in our glamorous selection epitomises the height of luxury. Go on, you deserve it.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: 35 Years of SBC
channel.desc: Celebrate 35 years of SBC offering superb beauty formulas that harness the powerful properties of plants to help support your skin and wellbeing.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Elevate your Space
channel.desc: Elevate your Space with Kelly Hoppen.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Michael Van Clarke
channel.desc: Transform your tresses with Michael Van Clarke's expert haircare. Achieve strong, vibrant, A-lister hair that shines. Say farewell to bad hair days.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Ruth Langsford on 4 Easy Pay
channel.desc: Explore stylish fashion with Ruth Langsford and spread the cost in 4, interest-free. Discover classic basics, vibrant prints and effortlessly chic styles. Tune in and transform your look today.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: OPI Professional Nailcare
channel.desc: As one of the world's largest manufacturers of professional nail products, OPI is a must-have for anyone wanting salon-quality results in their own home.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: bareMinerals
channel.desc: The perfect blend of cosmetics and skincare, the bareMinerals range is ideal for women who are concerned about the additives, preservatives and fragrances routinely found in make-up.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Centigrade Outerwear
channel.desc: A wide range of high-quality, fashion-inspired coats and jackets in soft, luxurious fabrics. This competitively-priced collection is designed to complete your daytime or evening look to perfection.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Morning Show
channel.desc: Wake up to QVC! We've chosen products from across all our ranges to ensure there is something for everyone to enjoy. Tune in to see special guests too.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Morning Style with Katy
channel.desc: Join Katy and our trusted stylists and fashion experts as we help you create your perfect wardrobe, showing you how to bring key pieces and different looks together to showcase your personal style.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Cozee Home
channel.desc: Create a warm and cosy sanctuary in your home, with the Cozee Home range of snuggly bedding, throws and accessories offering comfort and coziness in your home.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Denim & Co
channel.desc: Join us to see Denim & Co's clothing range offering trend-focused pieces combined with timeless style and chic choices for your smart or casual looks.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Footwear Deals up to 60% Off
channel.desc: Footwear Deals up to 60% Off.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Menopause Your Way
channel.desc: Join Jackie Kabler as she chats to our panel of experts and founders about the menopause, helping you navigate midlife on your terms. From inspiring stories to game-changing products, tune in today.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Malissa J Collection
channel.desc: Discover the Malissa J Collection and indulge in fashion and accessories that boast the latest trends, exceptional quality, and chic, versatile day-to-night designs offered at affordable prices.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: SBC Targeted Treatments
channel.desc: Discover targeted treatments from SBC, offering superb beauty formulas that harness the powerful properties of plants to help support your skin and wellbeing.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: OPI Professional Nailcare
channel.desc: As one of the world's largest manufacturers of professional nail products, OPI is a must-have for anyone wanting salon-quality results in their own home.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Diamond Spectacular
channel.desc: Continuing the extravaganza celebrating the timeless beauty of Diamonds. Join us as we view at least 60 truly dazzling designs, ranging from subtle to breathtaking and classic to contemporary.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Alison Young
channel.desc: Give your skin the hydration it needs with our expert Alison Young giving her hints and tips in our beauty show.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Christmas Spectacular Brand New
channel.desc: Christmas Spectacular Brand New Season.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: bareMinerals
channel.desc: The perfect blend of cosmetics and skincare, the bareMinerals range is ideal for women who are concerned about the additives, preservatives and fragrances routinely found in make-up.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Beauty Gift Ideas with OPI
channel.desc: See professional salon nailcare products demonstrated in QVC's own salon. OPI is a Californian quality nailcare company which has won multiple awards and have exclusive formulas in their range.

channel.desc: The Christmas Shop is here! Discover QVC's best festive merchandise, from animated characters to fibre optics and sound-activated d?cor. Perfect for creating a magical holiday home.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Christmas Morning Gift Show
channel.desc: Start your mornings feeling festive with some fantastic gift ideas for Christmas. We'll be inspiring you with a wide selection to suit every taste, from novelty stocking fillers to thoughtful gifts.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Festive Fragrance Joy
channel.desc: Uplift your home this festive season with our wonderful selection of home fragrances. Discover new and traditional scents to add a dash of festive joy to your space.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Cosy Cottage Christmas Style
channel.desc: Cosy Cottage Christmas Style.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Gatineau Beauty Gifts
channel.desc: Gatineau fan? Us too! Join us as we talk all things beauty with this specialist brand, with a whole host of luxurious, must-have formulas any skincare sage would love.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Colours Of Christmas Gold
channel.desc: A show of Christmas gemset jewellery in 9ct gold including rings, pendants, earrings and bracelets.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: The Nostalgic Christmas Shop
channel.desc: Make your Christmas as magical as you remember with our fantastic range of animated characters, lighting, trees, decorations and more for indoors or outdoors.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Julien Macdonald Sparkle & Shine
channel.desc: Add glamour to your home with JM Home by Julien Macdonald. Discover sparkling furnishings and expert tips to create a designer look, all at an accessible price.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Salon Favourites with SBC
channel.desc: Discover beauty favourites from SBC, offering superb formulas that harness the powerful properties of plants to help support your skin and wellbeing.

channel.title: Christmas with Bethlehem Lights
channel.desc: Christmas with Bethlehem Lights.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Cozee Home on Easy Pay
channel.desc: Cozee Home on Easy Pay.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Accessories Gift Hall
channel.desc: Find the perfect gift with fashion accessories by some of our most sought-after brands. From chic purses and wallets to cosy PJs and slippers, there's something for everyone.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Starry Night Christmas Special
channel.desc: Starry Night Christmas Special.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Hotel Chocolat
channel.desc: Join us for an utterly delicious show as Hotel Chocolat share their tempting collections and luxurious gift ideas, featuring exquisite chocolate made from rich Saint Lucian cacao.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Festive Culinary Gifts
channel.desc: Find the festive route to their heart this holiday season with our delightful array of culinary gift ideas - perfect for your Secret Santa, budding chefs or a loved one with a sweet tooth.
